resources.string: Changes that you made may not be saved.
The bot will know your phone number. This can be useful...
Allow this bot to send you messages?
Do you want to allow %s to use biometry?
The developer requires the following resources:
Allow %1$s to access to your location?\n\nThe developer of %1$s will be able to access your location when this web app is open.
Allow %1$s to access to your microphone?\n\nThe developer of %1$s will be able to access your microphone when this web app is open.
Allow %1$s to access to your camera?\n\nThe developer of %1$s will be able to access your camera when this web app is open.
Allow %1$s to access to your camera and microphone?\n\nThe developer of %1$s will be able to access your camera and microphone when this web app is open.
